content:
Yes, Foobar2000 is compatible with Mac computers! However, the Mac version of Foobar2000 is still in beta and may not be as stable as the Windows version. Additionally, not all of the features available in the Windows version are available in the Mac version. 

There are also many other great media players available for Mac that support FLAC files, including:

1. VLC Media Player
2. Clementine
3. Audirvana 
4. Amarra
5. VOX

All of these media players are great choices for playing FLAC files on Mac computers.
